channel.description: Recent content in felladog blogs on felladog

item.title: Batch Normalization
item.description: Acknowledgement : d2l.ai batch normalization L11.2 How BatchNorm Works - Sebastian Raschka https://twitter.com/karpathy/status/1013245864570073090 Questions : What is Normalization? Normalization A popular and effective technique that constantly accelerates the convergence of deep network. Normalizes hidden layer inputs. Helps with exploding/vanishing gradient problems. Can increase the training stability and convergence rate. Can be understood as additional(normalization) layers(with additional parameters).

item.title: blog using org and hugo
item.description: References : https://ddavis.io/ Copied shamelessly from here* https://seds.nl/ My ultimate plan Questions : I have made a base site using hugo static generator. The posts are written using org-mode from emacs. The plugin `ox-hugo` converts the org file to markdown and places it to the posts folder of the hugo site folder. I have also used roam capture template so that the placeholder for tags and categories are predefined in new org files.
